title: Thomas the Tank Engine; Thomas and Gordon (Captioned)
viewing_guidelines: CAPTIONED: suitable for hearing impaired viewers
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Puppet films
description: Episode of Series "Thomas the tank engine & friends". It's full steam ahead for Thomas, the little blue engine with the short, stumpy funnel, short, stumpy boiler and short, stumpy dome and his special friends Gordon, Henry, James, Percy, Edward, Toby and Annie and Clarabel the carriages, and of course their boss, the Fat Controller. His friend, stroyteller Ringo Starr, says "Thomas is number one and never lets anyone forget it!" Based on The Railway Series by Rev W. Awdry.
